about_the_game:
NOTICE - The build featured in this demo is a work in progress, some graphical elements are missing and no save feature has been implemented.

DEMO MISSION:

Play as Caine Finnigan or Victoria Mosley, explore the underground laboratory responsible for this new strain of virus, Synthetic Conversion Syndrome. Salvage what you can, eliminate any threats and make your escape. As you traverse your surroundings, encounter a range of eldritch monsters that have spawned from this disease.

KEY FEATURES (all included in the demo build):

  • Crafting System - Loot your enemies as you go for raw materials, these materials can then be used to craft an array of weapons and replenish ammunition supplies.

  • Fixed Cameras - Carefully placed static cameras to add the immersion and tension as your explore.

  • No HUD - The absence of HUD allows you to fully immerse yourself in the games environments, enjoy a more cinematic experience.

  • Dual Control Scheme - Separate control scheme for aiming states; the character will always look towards the cursor while aiming, allowing the player to strafe with the keyboard. The character will navigate using classic tank controls when in a neutral state.

  • Unlockable content - Additional content can be unlocked upon completion.

  • Stalker - You will be pursued during your mission, run or fight at your own peril.

content_descriptors.notes: Conversion Strain contains content not appropriate for all ages; frequent violence or gore.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel I5-3570k 3.4Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia Geforce GTX 770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Corei5-12400F / AMD Ryzen 5 5600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1660 Super / AMD Radeon RX 6500 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Your mission is to investigate the origins of a deadly new strain of virus; named SCS (Synthetic Conversion Syndrome), created to subjugate all living things. Traverse the dark interiors of a clandestine testing facility, encountering the abominations within.
